name: Slice Night 2
description:
Billy Dreamwalker wanders into his next fantasy world, in the tight platforming adventure Slice Night 2! (no Slice Night 1 Knowledge required)

Play through an entire 40 hand-crafted, unique, challenging, (and most importantly fun) levels with tons of visual, mechanical, and enemy variety!

Wonderful music supplied by the amazing Lass Ellie and Bun.

Customized shirt colors, more weapon types, multiple save files, level select cheats, 54 collectible gems, forgiving checkpoints, a brutal hard-mode, and as much polishing as I could possibly do!

Get ready for an intense wall jumping, bot busting, gem grabbing, lock unlocking, block breaking, bullet dodging, boss beating great time!

Supports Xinput controllers, and keyboard+mouse.

(some sprites enhanced by bun, beta testing by sothopery, Sugunii, kaisaan, andyana jonseph)

Lass Ellie's YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXPlKMflmkijFuzYpki3Ung

Bun's youtube channel: https://youtube.com/c/bunnn
